---
title: "Tainá Rocha's CV"
author: Tainá Rocha
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
params:
  pdf_mode:
    value: true
output:
  pagedown::html_resume:
    css: ['dd_cv.css', 'custom.css','resume']
    self_contained: true
---
```{r metathis, echo=FALSE}
library(metathis)
meta() %>%
  meta_name("github-repo" = "Tai-Rocha/Tai-Rocha_CV.github.io") %>% 
  meta_social(
    title = "Tainá Rocha CV",
    description = paste(
      "CV made with the packages RMarkdown, pagedown, datadrivencv and googlesheet4"
    ),
    url = "https://github.com/Tai-Rocha/Tai-Rocha_CV.github.io/cv.html",
    image = "https://beatrizmilz.github.io/resume/img/share-card.png",
    image_alt = paste(
      "Tainá Rocha CV"
    ),
    og_type = "website",
    og_author = "Tainá Rocha",
    twitter_card_type = "summary_large_image",
    twitter_creator = "@beamilz"
  )
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  results='asis', 
  echo = FALSE
)

library(magrittr) # For the pipe
source("cv_printing_functions.r")

# Read in all data and initialize a CV printer object
CV <- create_CV_object(
  data_location = "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MUKWLJtWwxwiAsSwOghy1tkq41rTp9Ivt6y3LVx2JTI/edit#gid=917338460",  
  pdf_mode = params$pdf_mode
)
#CV$entries_data <- CV$entries_data %>% dplyr::filter(in_resume == TRUE)
```


```{r}
# When in pdf export mode the little dots are unaligned, so fix that with some conditional CSS.
if(params$pdf_mode) {
    cat("
<style>
:root{
  --decorator-outer-offset-left: -6.5px;
}
</style>")
}
```

Disclaimer {#disclaimer}
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This resume was made with the R package [**pagedown**](https://github.com/rstudio/pagedown) and [**datadrivencv**](http://nickstrayer.me/datadrivencv/index.html).

Code available on <i class="fa fa-github"></i>  [GitHub](https://github.com/beatrizmilz/resume). 

Last updated on `r Sys.Date()`. The most recent version of this resume is [available here](https://beatrizmilz.github.io/resume/index.pdf).
